Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Figurine \Fi`gu`rine"\ (? or ?), n. [F., dim. of figure.] A very small figure, whether human or of an animal; especially, one in terra cotta or the like; -- distinguished from {statuette}, which is applied to small figures in bronze, marble, etc. [1913 Webster]
figurine n : a small carved or molded figure [syn: {statuette}]
